text: if you're an enterprise with a large
number of applications and distributed
teams cloud setup and governance can be
complex and time-consuming slowing down
the very innovation you're trying to
speed up
that's where AWS control tower comes in
AWS control tower provides the easiest
way to set up and govern a secure
compliance multi-account AWS environment
based on best practices established
working with thousands of enterprises
here's how it works in three steps
step one set up AWS control tower lets
you automate setup with just a few
clicks using established blueprints for
configuring your AWS environment with
components such as a multi account
structure identity and federated access
management and account provisioning
workflows step to apply guardrails you
can apply security and compliance
policies using established guardrails
which prevent resources from being
deployed that don't conform to policies
plus you can detect and remediate
non-compliant accounts and resources as
your team provisions them step 3
monitor compliance you'll get visual
summaries of your AWS environment
through a dashboard that lets you see
your accounts guardrails and compliance
status all in one place with AWS control
tower you can save time and get greater
control over your AWS environment so you
can govern your workloads more easily
and empower your organization to
innovate at the speed of AWS get started
using AWS control tower today AWS Amazon
comm slash control tower
